audioText: Son corps tremblait beaucoup après avoir lu ce livre très émouvant qu'il ne pouvait plus oublier.
question: How was his body reacting after reading the book?
options: It was completely still and calm
It was moving energetically and confidently
It showed no physical reaction at all
explanation: The text states 'Son corps tremblait beaucoup après avoir lu ce livre très émouvant qu'il ne pouvait plus oublier' - His body was trembling a lot after reading this very moving book that he could no longer forget. 'Corps' means body, 'beaucoup' means a lot, and 'émouvant' means moving/touching.
